thread.title: The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore black
thread.title_full: The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore black

author: USA TODAY Sports
title: The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore black
text:
Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore black The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore all black at this week's tournament Post to Facebook The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore black The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore all black at this week's tournament Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/nike-equality-campaign-golf-jason-day-tiger-woods/ Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Nation's Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs The empowering reason Nike's golfers wore black Luke Kerr-Dineen , USA TODAY Sports 10:08 a.m. ET Feb. 19, 2017 
(Photo: Getty Images) 
Last week, Nike launched its "equality" campaign - one that was exceedingly well received among sports fans around the world. 
Here was Tiger Woods' advert. IF WE CAN BE EQUALS IN SPORT, WE CAN BE EQUALS EVERYWHERE. pic.twitter.com/NJCNn3nzcC â€” Tiger Woods (@TigerWoods) February 12, 2017 
And here was the general commercial. If we can be equals in sport, we can be equals everywhere. #EQUALITY pic.twitter.com/ki5NaJN12d 
And so, as a continuation of that "Equality" campaign, all of Nike's golfers competing in this week's Genesis Open dressed in head-to-toe black for the opening day of play in solidarity with the message. Jason Day 
Jason Day, of Australia, is seen on the seventh hole during the first round of the Genesis Open golf tournament at Riviera Country Club Thursday, Feb. 16, 2017, in the Pacific Palisades area of Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Ryan Kang) ORG XMIT: CARK1 Kyle Stanley 
PACIFIC PALISADES, CA - FEBRUARY 16: Kyle Stanley plays his shot from the fourth tee during the first round at the Genesis Open at Riviera Country Club on February 16, 2017 in Pacific Palisades, California. (Photo by Robert Laberge/Getty Images) ORG XMIT: 686968385 ORIG FILE ID: 642098762 Harris English
